summary: An ordinance relating to, and specifying a plan or system of additions and betterments to, and extensions of, the existing municipal light and power plant and system owned and controlled by the City of Seattle, declaring the estimated cost thereof as near as may be and providing for the issuance and sale of bonds of said city to provide funds therefor; authorizing the preparation of plans, the calling for bids and the letting of the contract for the construction and delivery to the City of Seattle, of a completed hydro-electric plant or plants, including transmission lines to said city; and for the creation of a special fund to pay the principal and interest of such bonds.
